body_html:
I encountered the same problem and worked it out. It seems that python can't find wheel module.
Does you use pyenv-virtualenv? you should install wheel on global python

pyenv global 3.6.0
pip3 install wheel
body_text:
I encountered the same problem and worked it out. It seems that python can't find wheel module.
Does you use pyenv-virtualenv? you should install wheel on global python
pyenv global 3.6.0
pip3 install wheel
body:
I encountered the same problem and worked it out. It seems that python can't find wheel module.
Does you use pyenv-virtualenv? you should install wheel on global python

```
pyenv global 3.6.0
pip3 install wheel
```
